actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to make available certain funds under the Emergency School Aid Act to agencies, institutions, and organizations in the territories and possessions of the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Emergency School Aid Act to make available certain funds for desegregation programs under such Act to certain territories and possessions of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to make available certain funds under the Emergency School Aid Act to agencies, institutions, and organizations in the territories and possessions of the United States.
